Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.user_interface.gui

Class BoardGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.client.user_interface.gui.BoardGui
  • public class BoardGui
extends java.lang.Object
    It's the board of the game, the player can effectively play the game with

      Contains WeaponButton of layout

      String showed when a wrong selection is performed
      private static double X_KILLSHOT_TRACK
      Ratio used to properly place a skull/kill on killshot track, on x axe
      private static double Y_KILLSHOT_TRACK
      Ratio used to properly place a skull/kill on killshot track, on y axe
      private static double Y_KILLSHOT_TRACK_OVERKILL
      Ratio used to properly place an overkill on killshotTrack, on y axe

      String to properly load PixelWeapon from file

      Contains PixelWeapon for yellowWeapons, in order to properly the buttons on layout

      Constructors

      BoardGui​(MatchView match)
      Create a new BoardGui from match.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void addConnectionState​(java.util.List<PlayerView> players)
      Create connection state GridPane and add it to view; it contains a label as title of the GridPane, and another one showing the current player (in white)
      private void addDamageTrack​(MatchView match)
      Creates DamageTracks and add them to view; the higher is the one referred to this client; the color is based on player's color
      private static void createParser​(int layout)
      Creates parser with chosen layout
      void createPlayerPositionHBox​(MatchView matchView)
      Creates and adds playerPositionsHBox to layout, translating them with pixelPositions
      private void createPlayerRectangle​(MatchView matchView)
      Creates and adds playerRectangles to layout, translating them with pixelPositions
      private static void createSquareList()
      Creates squareRectangles
      void createSquareRectangle​(MatchView matchView)
      Creates the SquareButton, adding them, invisible, to layout and translating them with pixelPositions
      private static void createStateText()
      Creates stateText
      private java.util.List<javafx.scene.paint.Color> getAllColors​(MatchView match)
      Returns the color of each player
      static double getHeight()
      Gets boardHeight
      static Parser getParser()
      Gets parser
      private PlayerRectangle getPlayerRectangle​(PlayerView playerView)  
      javafx.scene.Parent getView()
      Gets view
      static double getWidth()
      Gets boardWidth
      private static void setBoardHeight​(double height)
      Set boardHeight
      private static void setBoardWidth​(double width)
      Set boardWidth
      static void setUnvisibleSquareRectangle()
      Sets to invisible all squareRectangles
      static void showWrongSelection()
      Show wrong selection text when WrongSelectionException is caught
      void updateConnection​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Boolean> connections)
      Update connection state, adding two label for each player (and clearing old ones) : the former contains own name, the latter their connection state: this one is green if the respective player is online, otherwise is red
      void updateCurrentPlayer()
      Update currentPlayer with the name of the current one
      void updateDamageTrack​(PlayerView player)
      Updates the damageTrack of the specified player (damage, marks, skulls and check of frenzy mode are done)
      void updateKillshotTrack()
      Updates KillshotTrack, creating and adding a kill for each skull removed (max eight), then remaining skulls are added (old kills and skulls are removed)
      void updateLayout​(LayoutView layoutView)
      Updates layout, replacing all the AmmoButton and WeaponButton
      private void updateLayoutAmmo​(java.util.List<SquareView> squareViews)
      Updates all AmmoButton, creating and adding them to layout, clearing old ones, translating them with pixelPositions
      private void updateLayoutWeapon​(java.util.List<PixelWeapon> weapons, java.util.List<WeaponView> weaponViews)
      Updates the WeaponButton of the specified WeaponView and color on layout, creating and adding new ones, clearing the older ones, translating them with pixelWeapons
      void updatePayment()
      Updates payment
      void updatePlayer​(PlayerView player)
      Updates position and wallet of the specified player
      private void updatePosition​(PlayerView player)
      Updates the position of the specified player, removing him from the old one and adding to the new one
      void updatePowerUp​(PlayerView player)
      Updates player's damageTrack info and your own power up, clearing old ones and recreating them
      void updateSelectables()
      Updates the selectables for this client, creating and adding them to the window, and clearing old ones.
      private void updateWallet​(PlayerView player)
      Updates the wallet of the specified player
      void updateWeapons​(PlayerView player)
      player's damageTrack info and creates and add WeaponButtons of your weapon (clearing old ones).

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardGui

        public BoardGui​(MatchView match)
        Create a new BoardGui from match. It adds the board, damageTracks, connection state of the player, PlayerRectangle, playerPosition, SquareButtons
        Parameters:
        match - The MatchView from which get information

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public javafx.scene.Parent getView()
        Gets view
        Returns:
        view

      • addDamageTrack

        private void addDamageTrack​(MatchView match)
        Creates DamageTracks and add them to view; the higher is the one referred to this client; the color is based on player's color
        Parameters:
        match - MatchView from which get all players' color

      • addConnectionState

        private void addConnectionState​(java.util.List<PlayerView> players)
        Create connection state GridPane and add it to view; it contains a label as title of the GridPane, and another one showing the current player (in white)
        Parameters:
        players - List of Player, from whom get the current one

      • updateConnection

        public void updateConnection​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Boolean> connections)
        Update connection state, adding two label for each player (and clearing old ones) : the former contains own name, the latter their connection state: this one is green if the respective player is online, otherwise is red
        Parameters:
        connections - Map containing each player and their own connection state

      • updateCurrentPlayer

        public void updateCurrentPlayer()
        Update currentPlayer with the name of the current one

      • updatePowerUp

        public void updatePowerUp​(PlayerView player)
        Updates player's damageTrack info and your own power up, clearing old ones and recreating them
        Parameters:
        player - The player to be updated

      • updateSelectables

        public void updateSelectables()
        Updates the selectables for this client, creating and adding them to the window, and clearing old ones. They includes: action, command as button and selectableSquares as SquareButton set to visible. Clicking on action or command button, the choice will be sent to the server

      • updateWeapons

        public void updateWeapons​(PlayerView player)
        player's damageTrack info and creates and add WeaponButtons of your weapon (clearing old ones). If they're unloaded, they have low opacity.
        Parameters:
        player - player who own updating weapons

      • updateKillshotTrack

        public void updateKillshotTrack()
        Updates KillshotTrack, creating and adding a kill for each skull removed (max eight), then remaining skulls are added (old kills and skulls are removed)

      • updatePlayer

        public void updatePlayer​(PlayerView player)
        Updates position and wallet of the specified player
        Parameters:
        player - The player to be updated

      • updatePosition

        private void updatePosition​(PlayerView player)
        Updates the position of the specified player, removing him from the old one and adding to the new one
        Parameters:
        player - The player to be updated

      • updateDamageTrack

        public void updateDamageTrack​(PlayerView player)
        Updates the damageTrack of the specified player (damage, marks, skulls and check of frenzy mode are done)
        Parameters:
        player - The player to Update

      • updateWallet

        private void updateWallet​(PlayerView player)
        Updates the wallet of the specified player
        Parameters:
        player - The player to be updated

      • updateLayout

        public void updateLayout​(LayoutView layoutView)
        Updates layout, replacing all the AmmoButton and WeaponButton
        Parameters:
        layoutView - The layout to be updated

      • updateLayoutWeapon

        private void updateLayoutWeapon​(java.util.List<PixelWeapon> weapons,
                                java.util.List<WeaponView> weaponViews)
        Updates the WeaponButton of the specified WeaponView and color on layout, creating and adding new ones, clearing the older ones, translating them with pixelWeapons
        Parameters:
        weapons - The PixelWeapon, from which get the position of the weapon
        weaponViews - The WeaponViews from which create new WeaponButton

      • updateLayoutAmmo

        private void updateLayoutAmmo​(java.util.List<SquareView> squareViews)
        Updates all AmmoButton, creating and adding them to layout, clearing old ones, translating them with pixelPositions
        Parameters:
        squareViews - SquareViews from which create new AmmoButton

      • createPlayerPositionHBox

        public void createPlayerPositionHBox​(MatchView matchView)
        Creates and adds playerPositionsHBox to layout, translating them with pixelPositions
        Parameters:
        matchView - MatchView from wich creates PlayerPositionHBox

      • createPlayerRectangle

        private void createPlayerRectangle​(MatchView matchView)
        Creates and adds playerRectangles to layout, translating them with pixelPositions
        Parameters:
        matchView - MatchView from which creates PlayerRectangle

      • createSquareRectangle

        public void createSquareRectangle​(MatchView matchView)
        Creates the SquareButton, adding them, invisible, to layout and translating them with pixelPositions
        Parameters:
        matchView - The MatchView from which get the coordinates of the square

      • getPlayerRectangle

        private PlayerRectangle getPlayerRectangle​(PlayerView playerView)
        Parameters:
        playerView - The playerView from whom get the PlayerRectangle
        Returns:
        The PlayerRectangle with the same playerView
